captions.text:
Hi Bold Bakers! I'm really excited to announce
my next All-New No Machine Ice Cream video

premiering this Thursday. And to get you ready
for this video, I'm going to show you how

to make an edible cookie dough so you can
make Cookie Dough Ice Cream. Also, stay tuned

for a sneak peek at all of the other fantastic
flavors you're going to see on Thursday.
So let's get baking!

An Edible cookie dough is really simple. It's
just a regular cookie dough without any eggs.

This is a great recipe for making cookie dough
frosting, cookie dough ice cream, and even just
for eating cookie dough right off the spoon.

In a large bowl, we're going to cream together
our butter and our brown sugar. Now you can

do this by hand or you can use an electric
mixer. Once these ingredients are well-combined,

we're going to add in our vanilla extract,
our flour and our milk. And then gently mix

these together. Once the flour goes in you
don't want to mix it for too long.

Lastly, add in your chocolate chips and mix them until
they're just combined. And there you have

it, a simple edible cookie dough. This will
be so good in our ice cream.

So do you guys want to have a little sneak
peek at what's to come this Thursday? Just

know the flavors coming up are the ones you
all have most requested so I know you're going to love them.

We're going to kick off our ice cream party
with Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. Then you'll

feel like a kid in a candy store with this
next most-requested flavor. And we'll top

it all off with an ice cream that needs know
introduction.

Those are just a few of the BIG & BOLD new
flavors you'll find at my ice cream party.

Make sure you tune in this Thursday so you
can see all of my new ice cream flavors. Thank

you so much for watching and I'll see you
really soon.

title: Edible Cookie Dough Recipe & NEW Ice Cream Video Announcement - Gemma's Bigger Bolder Baking
